title: Packet Loss - Please Help !
body:
First sorry If my english is bad, I am just looking for some help. Thanks!

Lately I am getting  packet loss every game. It's unplayable and it's tilting me. I have lost so many games cuz of it. I don't know what's the problem. In past it didn't occur but now for some reason it's happening every game. 
I am using WiFi but I used it in past and I haven't got this. 
Anyone who could help me to fix this ?

replies.body: Packet loss can be pretty frustrating, especially when you're playing a team game like League =\ . Let's first double check that this is truly packet loss with our helpful little [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). Grab your most recent game logs and toss them into that tool, take a screenshot of what it says using something like Gyazo, and paste it here for us to go over together ^_^!

Thanks on reply. Ok, here are my last two games:
1) https://gyazo.com/95c0a797cd1ae74d935335a2ffee5656
2) https://gyazo.com/6f6e4c7895e93af29436b2b0c9360424

Yeeeaaaa I'm seeing a good bit of packet loss in that SS. Send those logs over to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to look through them to see what we can help with.

Hello Xmar,

Packet loss can be frustrating and at times a nusense (I have 105-110 ms ping and lag daily). What you could try is running the hex tech repair tool here --> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs and see if that fixes your issue.
